reference.shortdesc: A parameter list is a specialized definition list that is designed for documenting parameters.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The parml element is specialized from dl. It is defined in the programming domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how a set of sample code is followed by a parameter list that defines those parameters:
example.codeblock:
This code example is a basic method signature:

returnType methodName(pList1, pList2)

The method requires the following parameters:

pList1 The first variable declaration that is passed to methodName pList2 The second variable declaration that is passed to methodName
